data.title: Tech Firms From Dell to HP Warn of Memory Chip Squeeze From AI
data.description: Consumer electronics makers including Xiaomi Corp. have sounded the alarm about potential price increases, while others including Lenovo Group Ltd. have begun stockpiling memory chips in anticipation of rising costs.  Counterpoint Research this month forecast a 50% price rise for memory modules through the second quarter of next year.
data.keywords: NAND flash memory, Jeff Clarke, memory chip, Dell Technologies Inc., Counterpoint Research, Bloomberg, Consumer electronics, HP Inc., random access memory, Xiaomi Corp.
